title: Something isnt right
body:
This patch did SOMETHING that made the game way less fun for me. I find it hard to believe that just removing spats from the carousel is what did it. The rise of rangers isn't really that much different than the rise and fall of other alliances... but this game just seems hollow now. Even winning feels like "yup, I got it" instead of how it was before- where i felt like i was outplaying my opponents... 
Does anyone feel the same way?

replies.body: 100% agree with this.  I'm not sure if it's about Spatulas but the past few days I haven't been enjoying the game as much.  I feel like the carousel has been really weird lately, like half the items are missing from each one.

yes! thanks lol
we are not alone! haha
Also i think one of the things that kind of kills it for me is when you are doing really well then suddenly stop being able to do anything. This actually happened to me i winstreaked all the way to top 2 and then i lost

I've noticed this too some times I start loosing and Get shit on even when Its a comp My supposed to counter.  I had a game wher I was shadow inferno ranger and usually I can at least win  a few bouts, But I mean I had a game we were both running pred we had basically mirror matched, I had level 2 rek he had lvl 1 I had lvl2 kog and skar vs his lvl 1 we both had lvl one mudo and he had a volibear lvl 2 to my WW lvl 2.  Only thing was his rek had gunblade and for what ever reason My team just got deleted.  I don't think I killed one of his units. I get if it came down to like his rek vs mine and it had items but I swear there are games where It just decides My team will loose and thats it.

It is the spatulas. Spatulas on the wheel added some skill to the game. being able to make your way around and get the spatulas no matter where they were at (especially on the opening wheel) took skill to be able to ge them at a high rate consistently. Now getting them on drops just means getting them is all %100 luck now. 

Used to be able to get at least 1 every game. I just got my 1st spatula in like 5 games.  All while seeing people with Force of Nature and other spat items.
